title: MATLAB Assessment Example Questions
text:
Hello!

This is the practice assessment for Assessment #1. You can take this practice assessment as many times as you want. Practice Assessment grades do not count towards your overall grade in the course.

To get started with the practice assessment, click on a question below!

allowAccess.comment: this is who needs time and a half for the assessment
this is who needs double time for the assessment
this is for the general student
